                      throws SnapshotReaderException
        Returns:
        the next record in this snapshot, or null if we have reached the end of the snapshot

      • skipRecords

        public void skipRecords(long number)
                 throws SnapshotReaderException,
                        java.lang.InterruptedException
        Read and discard number records.
        Parameters:
        number - of records to skip.
        Throws:
        SnapshotReaderException - on IO errors, or if there aren't enough records.
        java.lang.InterruptedException - it the calling thread is interrupted.

      • getSnapshotNumber

        public long getSnapshotNumber()
        Returns:
        the number of the snapshot this reader is reading from
